XXvabhdicu:3515: na cānuśayaḥ saṃprayukto na viprayuktaḥ; tasyādravyāntaratvāt /

XXvabhdicu:3609: yathāyogaṃ śeṣāsu khalu bhūmiṣu yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dharmānvayakṣāntibadhyā anuśayā āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyāḥ,
XXvabhdicu:3611: atha yā imāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo dhātvākāraprakārabhedena ṣaṭtriṃśaddhā bhinnāstāsāṃ pratyekaṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ ? tadārabhyate -

XXvabhdicu:3645: na ca nityāḥ, na cāgryā ityetadvistareṇāviṣkṛtam /

XXvabhdicu:3662: anātmānaśca dharmā iti tadaiva satkāyadṛṣṭyavacchedo bhavati,
XXvabhdicu:3665: tatra dharmadarśanamanityādyanyatamākāraṃ yasmādduḥkhābhisamayamātrādbhavatyata etad dṛṣṭidvayaṃ dukhadarśanaheyameveti siddham //
XXvabhdicu:3666: atha ya ete catvāro viparyāsāḥ- "anitye nityam" evamādayaste kiṃ svabhāvāḥ ? tadārabhyate-
XXvabhdicu:3675: puruṣameva tu svatantraṃ kartāraṃ vaśinamātmavādī manyamāno mamedamityabhyupagacchati tasmādātmadṛṣṭirevāsau /

XXvabhdicu:3687: anye kleśā na santīrakāḥ / iti catvāra eva /
XXvabhdicu:3689: nanu ca sūtra uktam- "ānitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ,
XXvabhdicu:3690: cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa evaṃ yāvadātmani" iti dvādaśa bhavanti /

XXvabhdicu:3714: asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me hīnaḥ, nāsti me śreyo nāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīnaḥ" iti /
XXvabhdicu:3724: iti evametā navamānavidhāstribhyo mānebhyo vyavasthāpyante mānāmimānonamānebhyaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3725: ta ete saptamānāḥ sarve 'pi darśanabhāvanāheyāḥ sthavirakṣemakasūtrokteḥ- "asti me eṣu pañcasūpādānaskandheṣvasmīti māno 'prahīṇaḥ" iti //
XXvabhdicu:3727: kiṃ punaryadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ sarvaṃ tadāryasya samudācarati ? netyāha /

XXvabhdicu:3733: yena khalu kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcitya prāṇivadhādattādānakāmamithyācāramṛṣāvādānadhyāpadyetaitadvadhādyaprahīṇamapi na samudācarati bhāvanāheyatvāt /
XXvabhdicu:3738: aho vatāhamairāvaṇaḥ syāṃ nāgarājā aho vatāhamasurendraḥ syāṃ vaimacitrādiḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3741: kiṃ punaratra kāraṇaṃ yadete 'prahīṇāḥ khalvapi santo nāryasya samudācaranti ?
XXvabhdicu:3748: kaukṛtyamapi cākuśalamavītarāgasyāryasyāprahīṇaṃ na cāsya tatsaṃbhavati cikitsāsamutthitatvāditi //
XXvabhdicu:3753: dvayoḥ khalu nikāyayoḥ duḥkhasamudayākhyayostaddarśanaheyāṇāṃ vakṣyamāṇānāṃ kleśānāmubhayatra labdhapratiṣṭhatvāt //

XXvabhdicu:3782: athaite nirmalālambanāḥ kati katyuparamamālambyante, kati bhūmipratipakṣaṃ ca ? taducyate-
XXvabhdicu:3789: mārgālambanānāṃ tu kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarva eva svabhūmikāḥ kleśāḥ mārga ālambanam /
XXvabhdicu:3791: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāmapyaṣṭamūmikānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ navabhūmi- ko 'nvayajñānapakṣyo mārga ālambanaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3792: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ mithyādṛṣṭyā nirodhaḥ paricchinna ālambyate, na mārgeṇa ? taducyate /
XXvabhdicu:3794: '; mārgo hi parasparahetukaḥ, na tu nirodha ityasti viśeṣaḥ //

XXvabhdicu:3802: parāmarśī ca yadyanāsravālambanau syātāṃ samyagdṛṣṭitvaṃ pratipadyeyātām /
XXvabhdicu:3811: tatra te ye 'nuśayāḥ svadhātubhūmisarvatragāste sakalāmeva pañcaprakārāṃ svadhātubhūmimālambanato 'nuśerate /
XXvabhdicu:3813: duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ duḥkhadarśana prahātavyameva nikāyaṃ yāvadbhāvanāprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyameveti //
XXvabhdicu:3819: anāsrave tu vastunyūrdhvabhūmike ca pravṛttireva satkāyadṛṣṭitṛṣṇayornāstīti na tatrānuśerate /
XXvabhdicu:3822: yo yena dharmeṇānuśayaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ sa tasminsaṃprayogiṇi saṃprayogato 'nuśerate yāvadaprahīṇo bhavatīti 'tu'; śabdo viśinaṣṭi /
XXvabhdicu:3823: tataścedamapi siddhaṃ bhavati- anāsravālambanā visabhāgadhātubhūmyālambanāśca saṃprayogata evānuśerate /
XXvabhdicu:3837: niruktanyāyena pūrvaṃ vā prāptimutsṛjya paścātsamudācārato 'nuśerata ityanuśayāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3839: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
XXvabhdicu:3844: Abhidh-d_289 ādyaṃ dṛṣṭidvayaṃ kāme nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ matam /
XXvabhdicu:3854: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā- "yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me na kṣamata itīyaṃ dṛṣṭirasaṃrāgāya na saṃrāgāya" iti /
XXvabhdicu:3855: tathoktam- idamagryaṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ yaduta no ca syānna ca me syānna bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyati" iti /
XXvabhdicu:3862: ebhyaḥ punaḥ katyakuśalamūlāni kati neti ? taducyate-
XXvabhdicu:3865: ye dharmā akuśalāścākuśalamūlaṃ ca darśanabhāvanāheyāśca pañcaprakārāśca ṣaḍvijñānakāyikāśca ta evākuśalamūlānīṣyante //
XXvabhdicu:3866: kiṃ punaryathākuśalāni anuśayānāṃ mūlāni santyevamavyākṛtānāmapi santīti ?
XXvabhdicu:3868: avidyā dhīśca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣāmānadṛṣṭayaḥ //
XXvabhdicu:3869: "trīṇi khalvavyākṛtamūlāni, avyākṛtāvidyā tṛṣṇā prajñā" iti kāśmīrāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3871: anivṛtāvyākṛtā ca prajñā hetutvena vartata ityasāvapyavyākṛtamūlam /
XXvabhdicu:3886: kiṃ parā tarhyeṣā ? yogināṃ vipattidhyānādhimokṣavyāvṛttipareti pūrvoktameva sādhuḥ //

XXvabhdicu:3892_1: vigṛhya sabhāyāṃ pañcabhiravayavaiḥ svapakṣaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya vādaḥ karaṇīyo nāto 'nyathā
XXvabhdicu:3894: kāni punastāni catvāri vyākaraṇāni ? kāśca tāścatasraḥ sthitayaḥ ? tadavadyotyate-
XXvabhdicu:3895: Abhidh-d_294 ekāṃśākhyaṃ vibhajyākhyaṃ pṛcchākhyaṃ sthāpyameva ca /
XXvabhdicu:3897: tatraikāṃśavyākaraṇam- kiṃ yaḥ kaścijjāyate sarvosau mriyate? omiti vācyam /
XXvabhdicu:3898: atha yaḥ kaścinmriyate sarvosau jāyata iti ?
XXvabhdicu:3899: vibhajya vyākartavyam- kṣīṇāsravo na jāyate 'nyaḥ sarvoṃ jāyate /
XXvabhdicu:3914: kaściddhi vādī sthānāsthāne saṃbhavāsaṃbhavākhye saṃtiṣṭhate kaścinna saṃtiṣṭhate /
XXvabhdicu:3917: yaḥ parikalpite dṛṣṭānte dārṣṭāntikārthe prasādhake saṃtiṣṭhate,
XXvabhdicu:3918: sa ca kathyo yo na santiṣṭhate so 'kathyaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3919: evaṃ pratipadi jñānavāditāyāṃ yaḥ santiṣṭhate sa kathyate /
XXvabhdicu:3922: atha kenānuśayena kasminvastuni saṃyuktaḥ ? tatra tāvadvastu kṣetravastvādipañcaprakāram /
XXvabhdicu:3932: prakāranaiyamyena tu duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ pañcasu nikāyeṣvālambanataḥ saṃyuktaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3937: athedānīmatītānāgatapratyutpannanaiyamyena kaḥ pudgalaḥ kasminvastuni katamenānuśayena saṃyuktaḥ ? tadidamudbhāvyate-
XXvabhdicu:3942: ata ete mānādayo 'tītāḥ pratyutpannāśca yasminvastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasminvastuni taiḥ saṃprayukto veditavyaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3948: ato ye mānarāgadayo nāgatā na prahīṇāstaiḥ sarvasmiṃstraiyadhvike vastuni saṃyuktaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3950: ato 'nyai rāgādibhiranāgatairanāgata eva vastuni saṃyukto 'tītairatīta eva pratyutpannaiḥ pratyutpanna eva /

XXvabhdicu:4390: navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yo yaḥ prakāraḥ pūrva prahīṇastasminprahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadavalambibhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto vijñātavyaḥ //
XXvabhdicu:4391: atha kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerate ? atra cālambananiyama eva tāvaddarśayitavyaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4393: tata eva tadvispaṣṭaṃ gamyate- amuṣminvastuni iyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata iti /
XXvabhdicu:4395: Abhidh-d_326 dharmāḥ ṣoḍaśa vijñeyāḥ pratyekaṃ tribhavātmakāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4397: dharmāstāvat kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu pratyekaṃ pañcaprakārā duḥkhādidarśanaheyā apraheyāśca nirmalā iti ṣoḍaśa bhavanti /
XXvabhdicu:4402: dharmasaṃgrahavijñāne vā pṛṣṭo dhātvāyatanaskandheṣu pātayitvā lakṣayet /
XXvabhdicu:4408: kasya vijñānasya katame dharmā gocarā iti ? tadāviṣkriyate-
XXvabhdicu:4411: kāmāvacarāḥ khalu duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyā dharmāḥ pratyekaṃ pañcānāṃ vijñānānāṃ gocarībhavanti /
XXvabhdicu:4412: katameṣāṃ pañcānām ? sveṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ kāmāvacarasya duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasya vijñānasyālambanam /
XXvabhdicu:4415: ekasya ca rūpāptasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ceti /
XXvabhdicu:4419: rupāvacaro hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo dharmaḥ aṣṭānāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /
XXvabhdicu:4423: bhāvanāprahātavyasya ca kuśalasya ūrdhvaikasyārūpyāvacarasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ca /
XXvabhdicu:4427: ārūpyāvacarāsta eva trayo dharmāḥ, daśānāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /
XXvabhdicu:4429: ityevaṃ tāvat traidhātukāḥ duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyābhāvanāheyāśca dharmā uktāḥ //
XXvabhdicu:4431: sarva eva traidhātukāḥ nirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ svanaikāyikādhikacittagocarā vijñātavyāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4432: kāmāvacaro hi nirodhadarśanaprahātavyo dharmo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyādivat pañcānāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /
XXvabhdicu:4435: rūpāvacarau nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyau pūrvavadaṣṭānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyekamālambanaṃ svanaikāyikasya cādhikasyeti navānām /
XXvabhdicu:4439: traidhātukānāṃ pañcānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ye 'ntyāstrayaḥ prakārā nirodhamārgadarśanabhāvanāheyākhyāḥ,
XXvabhdicu:4447: evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ dharmāṇāmetāni ṣoḍaśacittāni traidhātukāni pañcaprakārāṇyanāsravaṃ ca vyavasthāpyānuśayakāryaṃ yojayitavyam /
XXvabhdicu:4457: avyākṛtasya tu vipākajasya manobhaumasya sukhasaumanasyopekṣāsaṃprayuktasyānāsravasya ca duḥkhadharmajñānasamudayadharmajñānatatkṣāntisaṃprayuktasya vijñānasya /
XXvabhdicu:4458: tatrānāsrave vijñāne na kecidanuśayā anuśerate / sāsrave tu tatra tāvat-
XXvabhdicu:4462: rūpāvacare tvakliṣṭe kāmāvacaradharma gocarā eva rūpāvacarāḥ sarvatragāḥ, bhāvanāheyāścānuśerate //
XXvabhdicu:4463: Abhidh-d_333 catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4476: tasya tu caturthadhyānabhaumasyākliṣṭasya vijñānasya kāmadhātvālambanasyoṣmagatavimokṣāpramāṇā śubhādisaṃprayuktasyopekṣopavicārasaṃyuktasya vijñānasyālambanam /
XXvabhdicu:4484: samudaye tu samudayadarśanaheyāḥ sarve, duḥkhadarśanaheyāśca sarvatragāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4490: parivṛtte tu vijñāne kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyāḥ, nirodhadarśanaheyālambanāśca sāsravālambanāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4491: ye hyanāsravālambanāste nirvāṇālambane vijñāne 'nuśerate, na vijñānālambane /
XXvabhdicu:4495: caturthe 'pi khalu mārgadarśanaheye vijñāne kāmāvacarāstrayo mārgadarśanaheyāśca sāsravālambanā rūpāvacarāḥ savatragā bhāvanāheyāśca //
XXvabhdicu:4497: parivṛtte tu khalu vijñāne kāmāvacarāścatvāro nirodhadarśanaheyaṃ [Jaini_288] muktvā /
XXvabhdicu:4501: Abhidh-d_336 rūpāpte prathame 'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ //
XXvabhdicu:4503: rūpāvacare prathame khalu vijñāne kāmāvacarāstrayo duḥkhasamudayavisabhāgadhātvālambanāḥ saṃprayogataḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4512: Abhidh-d_338 tadvadeva dvitīye 'pi pañcame 'pi tathaiva ca //
XXvabhdicu:4520: kāmāvacarāḥ trayo duḥkhasamudayabhāvanāheyākhyāḥ, ārūpyāvacarāścatvāraḥ, nirodhākhyaṃ muktvā /
XXvabhdicu:4533: sve trayo duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāheyāḥ kāmāptāḥ eta eva / rūpāptāśca eta eva trayaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4546: Abhidh-d_343 ādyavattu parāvṛtte vijñāne nirdiśed budhaḥ //
XXvabhdicu:4547: parāvṛtte khalu vijñāne ādyavatkāmāvacarāstrayaḥ, nirodhamārgadṛggheyau hitvā /
XXvabhdicu:4554: te hi nirvāṇālambane vijñāne nānuśerate, vijñānālambane tu //
XXvabhdicu:4561: cakṣurindriye khalu bhāvanāheyāḥ sarvatragāścānuśayāḥ kāmāvacararūpāvacarā anuśerate /
XXvabhdicu:4562: evaṃ yāvatkāyendriye cakṣurdhātau rūpadhātau cakṣurvijñānadhātau yāvadvistareṇa kāyavijñānadhātau yāvadrūpaskandhe vācyam //
XXvabhdicu:4571: cakṣurindriyālambanālambane tu vijñāne catvāro nikāyā anuśerate /
XXvabhdicu:4586: tatrāpi sarvatragasaṃprayukte cetasi asarvatragā vardhanta iti trayo bhavanti /
XXvabhdicu:4591: Abhidh-d_347 duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4597: Abhidh-d_350 sukhendriye tadālambe citte tadgocare 'pi ca /
XXvabhdicu:4601: kāmāvacaraṃ bhāvanāprahātavyam, rūpāvacaraṃ pañcaprakāram, anāsravaṃ ceti /
XXvabhdicu:4607: tatra yathāyogaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyāḥ rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtāvalambanāḥ,
XXvabhdicu:4610: tatpunaḥ sukhendriyālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ yasya cittasyālambanaṃ taccittaṃ sukhendriyā lambanālambanam /
XXvabhdicu:4612: tatkhalu sukhendriyālambanaṃ [Jaini_292] dvādaśavidhaṃ cittaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam ?
XXvabhdicu:4613: tasyaiva ca dvādaśavidhasyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśana prahātavyasya /
XXvabhdicu:4615: tatrārūpyāvacarau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāśca catvāro nikāyāḥ,
XXvabhdicu:4620: manaindriye khalu sarvatraidhātukāḥ ye 'pi te nirvāṇālambanāste 'pi saṃprayogataḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4627: adhunā ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ kasya cittasya samanantaraṃ kati cittānyutpadyanta ityupadiśyate /
XXvabhdicu:4629: bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyorddhvaṃ pañca pañca vā //
XXvabhdicu:4632: sa yadā kāmadhātoścyutvā rūpadhātāvupapadyate tasya tatratyāni pañca bhavanti /
XXvabhdicu:4635: ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa //
XXvabhdicu:4644: rūpakāmeṣūpapadyamānasya tatratyāni daśa bhavanti / svāni pañca pañcānyataḥ / gatametat //
XXvabhdicu:4645: idānīṃ vaktavyam / atha yadidaṃ sānuśayaṃ cittamuktaṃ tatkatham ? ityatrābhidhīyate-
XXvabhdicu:4650: tatra kliṣṭaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ sānuśayaṃ yadaprahīṇakleśam /
XXvabhdicu:4652: tatra kliṣṭaṃ cittamanuśayaiḥ saṃprayuktairaprahīṇaiḥ sānuśayaṃ tadālambanaiścāprahīṇaiḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4653: kathamiha yo 'nuśayo yena cittena saṃprayuktaḥ sa khalvaprahīṇastasmiṃścitte 'nuśete ?
XXvabhdicu:4654: yāvaddhi tadanuśayānuprāptiviśeṣeṇa sā cittasantatiravaṣṭabdhā cādhiṣṭhitā ca bhavati,
XXvabhdicu:4655: niṣyandaphalasya cānāgatasya tasyāṃ cittasantatau sabhāgaheturutpattaye kṛtāspado bhavati,
XXvabhdicu:4657: tasya punaḥ kleśāśīviṣasya prāptidraṃṣṭrāvabhaṅge kṛte vidyamāno 'pi san kleśastasmiṃścetasyanarthānutpādanāt sannapi saṃprayogataḥ nānuśeta ityucyate /
XXvabhdicu:4660: na tu kadācinmuñjeśīkāvaduddhṛtya śakyate tasmāt kleśaḥ cittātpṛthakkartuṃ nirnāśayituṃ vā svālambanādvā vimukhīkartum /
XXvabhdicu:4661: uktaṃ hi- "yo dharmo yasya dharmasyālambanaṃ kadācitsa dharmastasya dharmasya nālambanam ?
XXvabhdicu:4669: tayā ca satkāyadṛṣṭyā tatsaṃprayuktayā cāvidyayā sahāyabhāvena cānuśayāne ca sānuśayam /
XXvabhdicu:4672: evaṃ sarvaiḥ duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaṃḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaiśca saṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ yathāyogamabhyūhitavyam /
XXvabhdicu:4688: Abhidh-d_358 rāgaḥ svadṛśi mānaśva dveṣo 'nyatra pratāyate /
XXvabhdicu:4690: iha tāvad bālasya pañcopādānaskandhātmake duḥkhe saṃmugdhasya phalabhūtān pañcopādānaskandhānajānataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭirūpajāyate /
XXvabhdicu:4693: tasyaivaṃ bhavati- yadi tāvadayaṃ nityo 'vikārī puruṣaḥ kiṃ dharmeṇa yaḥ sukhena nānugṛhyate,
XXvabhdicu:4700: tasya khalu mithyādarśanabhūtagrahāvedha śādaśreyasi śreyobuddhyā pravṛttasyānagre cāgryabuddhyabhiniviṣṭasya svapakṣe rāgo bhavati parapakṣe ca dveṣaḥ pravartate /
XXvabhdicu:4704: kalyāṇamitrapāpamitrasaṃsargāddhi prāyeṇa śraddhādīnāṃ guṇānāmeṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ samudācārapravṛttiḥ ācāryāṇāmabhimateti / sa punareṣaḥ-
XXvabhdicu:4716: atha ya ime bhagavatā traya āsravā ākhyātāḥ- "kāmāsravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsravaśca /
XXvabhdicu:4718: Abhidh-d_360 vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4738: avidyāsravaḥ pañcadaśadravyāni / tāni piṇḍenāṣṭottaraṃ dravyaśatamāsravāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4745: apaharanti śleṣayanti ca [Jaini_299] tathaivaikākinyo 'pi dṛṣṭaya iti /
XXvabhdicu:4756: Abhidh-d_362 sāvidyā dve upādāne yathāktau dve tu dṛṅmaye /
XXvabhdicu:4759: tatra kāmayoga eva sahāvidyayā kāmopādānaṃ catustriṃśad dravyāṇi /
XXvabhdicu:4763: bhavayoga eva sahāvidyayā ātmavādopādānam, aṣṭātriṃśad dravyāṇi /
XXvabhdicu:4790: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ tisro dṛṣṭayaḥ parāmarśasaṃyojanaṃ dve dṛṣṭī /
XXvabhdicu:4791: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ pṛthaguktam ?
XXvabhdicu:4802: ādyantye dve dṛśau kāṅkṣākāmacchando dvireva yaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4804: tadyathā- satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti /
XXvabhdicu:4806: avarā hi kāmadhātūretāni ca tadanuguṇāni / yasmāt
XXvabhdicu:4810: anye punarāhuḥ- tribhiḥ sattvāvaratāṃ nātikrāmati pṛthagjanatvam,
XXvabhdicu:4812: yadā khalu strotaāpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇe ṣaṭ kleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayamevāha satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca ? taducyate-
XXvabhdicu:4815: pravartakagrahaṇe khalu pravartyamapi gahītaṃ bhavati pradīpālokavat /
XXvabhdicu:4820: athavā trividhā kleśāḥ- ekaprakārāḥ, dviprakārāḥ, catuṣprakārāśca /
XXvabhdicu:4827: satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ khalu sarvānarthamalānāṃ kleśasya ca bhavatrayasya ca mūlam /
XXvabhdicu:4829: mārgasya ca sadbhūtasya pratyarthibhūtaḥ kumārgāvalambī śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4832: [Jaini_304] tayā prahīṇayā samyagdṛṣṭisaṃkalpapuraḥsaro mārgo nirvibandhaḥ pravartate /
XXvabhdicu:4835: yathā khalu trayo 'ntarāyā mārgagamane bhavantyagantukāmatānyamārgagrahaṇaṃ mārgabahutvasaṃdehācca mārgagamanāpratipattiḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4839: vicikitsā mārgasaṃśaye sati mārgāpratipattirityeṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ strotaāpannasya dyotayadbhagavānkleśatrayasyaiva grahaṇamakārṣīditi //
XXvabhdicu:4840: yathā ca pañcavidhamavarabhāgīyaṃ saṃyojanamuktavāṃstathā pañcordhvabhāgīyānisaṃyojanānyākhyātavān sūtre /
XXvabhdicu:4843: tadyathā- rūparāgaḥ, ārūpyarāgaḥ, auddhatyam, māno 'vidyā ca /
XXvabhdicu:4856: ete ca trayo mūlakleśāḥ ṣaḍvijñānabhaumāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4861: tatra gṛhī abhidhyayā viṣayeṣu grathitastadvyāghātakartṛṣu vivādamārabhamāno dveṣeṇānubadhyate /
XXvabhdicu:4867: ye tāvatkhalu kleśā upakleśā api te cittopakleśanāt /
XXvabhdicu:4869: ye 'pi cānye caitasikāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāḥ te 'pyupakleśā ityākhyāyante //
XXvabhdicu:4870: ke punaste kleśamalāḥ kāni vā paryavasthānāni ? tatra tāvat-
XXvabhdicu:4890: avadyaṃ chādayataḥ cittāpalepo mrakṣaḥ, cittaṃ mrakṣayatīti mrakṣaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4895: kāyacittākarmaṇyatā middhaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepaḥ svapnākhyaḥ, sa tu kliṣṭa eva paryavasthānam /
XXvabhdicu:4898: svavastunyāgraho mātsaryam, matto mā saredetaditi niruktiḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4901: athaiṣāmupakleśamalaparyavasthānānāṃ kaḥ kasya rāgādermūlakleśasya niṣyandaḥ ? tadidamārabhyate //
XXvabhdicu:4904: yaduta- ahrīkyauddhatyamadamātsaryakuhanālapanānaimittikatānaiṣpeśikatā lābhena lābhasya niścikīrṣatā pāpecchatā mahecchatecchasvitā kāmajñātijanapadavitarkapāpamitratādayaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4916: jñātisnehaparītasya tadāvāhavivāhakṛṣivaṇigrājasevādīnāṃ gṛhasandhāraṇamupajīvanopāyānāṃ rājataskarādibhayapraśamanopāyānāṃ ca vitarkāṇāṃ vitarkaḥ jñātivitarkaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4958: atha kaḥ kleśaḥ kayā vedanayā saṃprayujyate ? tadidamārabhyate-
XXvabhdicu:4962: Abhidh-d_377 dveṣasya daurmanasyena duḥkhena ca nigadyate //
XXvabhdicu:4963: saṃyoga iti vartate / pratighaḥ khalu duḥkhadaurmanasyābhyāṃ saṃprayuktaḥ //
XXvabhdicu:4967: mithyādṛṣṭirhi daurmanasyasaumanasyābhyāṃ saṃprayujyate, pāpakarmaṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇāṃ ca yathākramam /
XXvabhdicu:4971: śeṣāstvanuśayāḥ- catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ, mānaśca / harṣākāravṛttitvātsaumanasyena saṃprayuktāḥ //
XXvabhdicu:4979: yasyāṃ yasyāṃ bhūmau yāvantīndriyāṇi santi tatrāpi cāturvijñānakāyikāścāturvijñānakāyikairmanobhūmikā manobhūmikaireva yathāsaṃbhavam //
XXvabhdicu:4981: Abhidh-d_380 īrṣyayā daurmanasyena kaukṛtyasya tathā krudhaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4986: kecitpunaḥ vyācakṣate- saumanasyena saṃprayujyate lobhānvayatvena harṣākāravartitvāt /
XXvabhdicu:4987: Abhidh-d_381 dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca //
XXvabhdicu:4999: idamidānīṃ vaktavyam / ka eṣāṃ kiṃ prahātavyaḥ ? yāni tāvaddaśa paryavasthānāni tebhyaḥ-
XXvabhdicu:5015: prāyeṇa hi sattvāḥ rūpādyupabhogaratatvāt mokṣavimukhā bhavanti vedanābhinanditvāt,
XXvabhdicu:5030: tena tu catvāryapi smṛtyupasthānānyabhisamasyānityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataśceti caturbhirākāraiḥ pratyavekṣate /
XXvabhdicu:5031: tataḥ punaryogī kāyaṃ paramāṇusaṃghātakṣaṇasantānabhedena prabhidya paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇaśaśca nirīkṣate /
XXvabhdicu:5032: kalalādīnāṃ vā bījādyaśucyaṅgāni pṛthaṅmiśrībhūtāni ca yogī rūpāṇi nimitteṣu paśyati /
XXvabhdicu:5033: tadūrdhvaṃ tasyānityatvādibhiḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇena yathāyogaṃ sarvadharmakajātīyatvādhimokṣe satyahaṃkāramamakāraviṣkambhanaprahāṇaṃ bhavati /
XXvabhdicu:5035: katamena punaratra smṛtyupasthānena kleśātyantakṣayo bhavati ? brūmaḥ /
XXvabhdicu:5050: tasya pratikṣaṇaṃ utpādavyayaṃ paśyataḥ evaṃ bhavati- kathaṃ caite saṃskārāḥ santānena pravartante nocchidyante /
XXvabhdicu:5051: sa pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati traiyadhvikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ hetuphalasambandhaniyamāvasthitānām /
